targets.rawSQL:
SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as Drink_Sales, l.location_name FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
JOIN locations as l ON l.location_id = t.location_id
WHERE l.location_name = 'Birmingham' AND $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name, l.location_name ORDER BY Drink_Sales DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 Most Sold Drinks in Birmingham

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', date_time) AS hour,
  COUNT(*) AS transaction_count
FROM
  transactions
WHERE
      date_time >= '2023-05-23 09:00'
  AND date_time <= '2023-05-23 18:00'
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour

SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as item_count FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
Join transactions as t On t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
Where  $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name ORDER BY item_count DESC;

SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as Drink_Sales, l.location_name FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
JOIN locations as l ON l.location_id = t.location_id
WHERE location_name != 'test' AND $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name, l.location_name ORDER BY Drink_Sales DESC, l.location_name  LIMIT 20;

SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as item_count FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
GROUP BY i.item_name ORDER BY item_count DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Top 20 products - grouped by sold amounts

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as Large_Espresso_Sales, l.location_name FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
JOIN locations as l ON l.location_id = t.location_id
WHERE l.location_name = 'Birmingham' AND i.item_name = 'Large Espresso' AND $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name, l.location_name ORDER BY Large_Espresso_Sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as item_count FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name ORDER BY item_count DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT i.item_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as item_count FROM items as i
INNER JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.item_id = i.item_id
JOIN transactions as t ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name ORDER BY item_count DESC;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', date_time) AS hour,
  COUNT(*) AS transaction_count
FROM
  transactions
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour

panels.title: Transaction Count Per Hour In A Day

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT i.item_name, l.location_name, COUNT(ti.item_id) as item_count
FROM transactions AS t
JOIN transaction_items as ti ON ti.transaction_id = t.transaction_id
JOIN items as i ON i.item_id = ti.item_id
JOIN locations AS l ON l.location_id = t.location_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(t.date_time) 
GROUP BY i.item_name, l.location_name ORDER BY item_count DESC
LIMIT 15;
